# Malicious inputs for security testing
# Format: one input per line

# Command injection attempts
owner/repo; rm -rf /
owner/repo$(whoami)
owner/repo`id`
owner/repo|cat /etc/passwd
owner/repo&& echo pwned
owner/repo|| echo pwned

# Path traversal
../../../etc/passwd
owner/../../../etc/shadow
./../../.git/config

# Null byte injection
owner/repo\x00.git
owner\x00/repo

# Newline injection
owner/repo
malicious-command

# Shell metacharacters
owner/repo$HOME
owner/repo${PATH}
owner/repo>(output.txt)
owner/repo<(input.txt)

# Unicode normalization attacks
owner/repo\u202E\u0065\u0078\u0065
